description: four small numbered landscapes printed on one sheet; No.49: river view framed by trees; No. 50: forest scene with two figures at left; No. 51: river view with house on hill at left; two figures on bank; sail boat in water; No. 52: river view; building and silo at left; trees on bank; island in river
marks:
Inscription and Date

each image numbered (49-52 1778
title: Untitled [four little landscapes]
